channel.title: Minecraft [UPDATE THREAD] - 1.5 Beta
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Minecraft Update Thread[/size][/center]
[i]Since I don't have much to do, I'm going to post about updates on here (starting from Beta 1.5). I will post all the information from various blogs, and gather interesting video's and maybe even expected updates. Feel free to discuss what you think of current updates or what you think should be added, changed or improved.[/i]
[size=15pt][u][b]Version = [1.5-1.5_01 Beta][/b][/u][/size]
[u]Added:[/u]
[ul][li]Achievements - Use the menu to complete achievements by performing the required tasks in the "diary".[/li] [li]Stats - The ability to view and sort recorded data about your player on the world/server.[/li] [li]Weather - Rain and snow. During rain there are thunderstorms. Lightning causes fire and, if it hits a pig, causes them to become pig-zombies.[/li] [li]Rails - Detector and booster - improve your mine track![/li] [li]The option to "shift click".[/li] [li]You can choose the size of the GUI or set it to auto.[/li] [li]Improved performance - This is a great update in my opinion. (If you have a slow computer, turn Advanced GL OFF.)[/li][/ul]
[u]Fixed:[/u]
[ul][li]Wolf's should now be able to follow you in/out of doors without getting stuck. They should also stop whining as much. (Thank god!)[/li] [li]Ladders have to be placed one after the other.[/li] [li]You can now harvest seeds with water again![/li][/ul]
[b]Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qy882ILYJMM&feature=player_embedded]HERE[/url] to view the weather update.[/b]

item.title: Minecraft [UPDATE THREAD] - 1.5 Beta
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:47, topic:391458”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=487467.msg3582039#msg3582039 date=1303870381]

Mitb better update asap

The zombie pigman idea was pretty smart, although thunderstorms are appearently dark enough for mobs to spawn.

I have noticed one thing, mobs spawn a hell of a lot faster. I was on minecraftrealm, on the earlier versions mobs would barely spawn in the city but this time I had 5+ of them immediately spawn. I love how if a mob attacks another mob they start killing each other.

^ calls for a new mob trap (Might try and do that when Moparcraft gets updated).

But I really hope thunderstorms can make mobs spawn, it’d be a really nice addition and would add an element of surprise to the game. Also, what zombie pigman?

During a thunderstorm, light level is reduced to about 7-8, which is just enough for mobs to spawn. Also, when lightening strikes pigs, they turn into zombie pigmen.

Oddly enough I have been trying to find a thunderstorm, but seem to only get Rain/Snow.
[/quote]

The good thing that I found out is that even if thunder that hits the ground and sets something ablaze, the rain will immediate put it out.[/quote]

That makes the slabs the biggest fucking waste of time -.-

Read full topic

The good thing that I found out is that even if thunder that hits the ground and sets something ablaze, the rain will immediate put it out.
